title: Blizzard confirms Warcraft game coming to mobile devices in 2022
content:
As smartphones and tablets have become the primary gaming device for many users, we have seen major game franchises coming to iOS and Android. This week, game publisher Blizzard confirmed that it is working on a new Warcraft game for mobile devices.

more…

The post Blizzard confirms Warcraft game coming to mobile devices in 2022 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Game publisher Blizzard confirmed that it is working on a new Warcraft game for mobile devices with a launch set for 2022.
